Question 34
Ambient pressure, temperature and relative humidity at a location are 101 kPa, 300 K and 60% 
respectively. The saturation pressure of water at 300 K is 3.6 kPa. The specific humidity of ambient air is 
_____ g/kg of dry air
Refrigeration and Air Conditioning (Psychrometry)
(A) 21.9 
 
(B) 21.4 
(C) 13.6 
(D) 35.1 
Ans. 
C
